title: Rilke Pipe Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic pipe definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the pipe?

path.description: The path at which to create the pipe, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new pipe.

skipImport.description: Do not import this pipe into the owning NgModule.

layer.description: Determine which layer it belongs to.

x-prompt.message: Which layer would you like to use it in?

module.x-prompt: Which NgModule would you like to use this interface?

export.description: The declaring NgModule exports this pipe.
